channel.title: Jsm on Tristan Berchoux
channel.description: Recent content in Jsm on Tristan Berchoux

item.title: Help me find the good JSM talks
item.description: I’m about to head out for JSM in a couple of weeks. The sheer magnitude of the conference means it is pretty hard to figure out what talks I should attend. One approach I’ve used in the past is to identify people who I know give good talks and go to their talks. But that isn’t a very good talk-discovery mechanism. So this year I’m trying a crowd-sourcing experiment.Â First, some background on what kind of talks I like.
